DOC.brief_summary: This study 50 postpartum woman interested Mirena® LNG-IUS place contraception . The Mirena® FDA approve intrauterine contraceptive device provide contraception 5 year excellent effectiveness . Women enrol study Mirena® place two-weeks postpartum ( day 14-20 postpartum ) . The participant follow 6-weeks 6-months postpartum study visit evaluate satisfaction , symptom , expulsion , perforation . The study complete six-months postpartum , participant able keep LNG-IUS follow study completion .
